All Classes

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Button
    Button is the class for buttons in the world.
    Coin
    A coin entity which adds to the player's coinsCollected stat.
    EndCard
    The final screen of the game, determines whether the player has won or lost, and directs them to the Main Menu again.
    Energy
    An Energy entity which boosts the player's walkSpeed stat.
    Entity
    Entity is a parent class shared by all entities in the game.
    Ghost
    Ghosts will seek a target and move towards that target, removing any obstacles in their way.
    Glue
    A glue entity which reduces the player's walkSpeed stat.
    Health
    A Health entity which adds one to the player's lives stat.
    ImageLabel
    ImageLabels display a GreenfootImage as a user interface element.
    LevelSelect
    The world that appears after the player has chosen either 1 player or 2 player mode.
    Menu
    The default World class, which is the menu screen the user initialy sees.
    Menu1
    The world with all game objects, the player, the villains; the main playground.
    Obstacle
    Serves no purpose except for the future- if I wanted to add multiple types of obstacles, I wouldn't have to go back and change much code.
    Player
    Player class description.
    Scoreboard
    Displays the amount of coins collected and lives for each player in the game.
    UserInterface
    Contains methods accessable to UI object subclasses, and used to identify subclasses as UI objects.
    Villain
    Parent class for all Villains in the game: Ghosts and Zombies.
    Wall
    Walls will block the player and zombies from getting past.
    Zombie
    Write a description of class Zombie here.
